grammar: masc nom sg of saṅghādisesa, comp
meaning_lit: offence requiring involvement of the community from start to finish

sentence: yāvatatiyañ'ce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajeyya, icc'etaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajeyya, saṅghādiseso
pali_1: (if) being admonished up to three times, he should relinquish it, that is good, (but) if he should not relinquish (it), is a saṅghādisesa (offence).
